alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 9:42PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Duval and northeastern Webb Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 941 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Freer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Freer, Benavides, Seven Sisters, Ranchitos Las Lomas and Rosita. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 752 and 810. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Texas.
